classes

Class Villain

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Character
      • classes.Villain

  • public class Villain
extends Character
    Villain is a child class of the Heroes and Villains application. It extends the @Character class and creates opponents for the player's party.
    Author:
    Adam Conway, Flynn Doherty
